description:
My Udemy course has over 600 students in the first week. Start making money in the stock market with your current account or practice with a virtual account and basic trading knowledge, immediately - nothing else is required but your desire to want a become a better trader.

Last Updated 9/27/2015 - new quiz questions and new links in the last section to help with chart patterns and technical indicators.

+++++++++++++++++++++++

About this course:

  • Only your desire and determination is required
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

WHAT YOU GET:

  • You will recognize and understand the mental traps and mind games we ALL fall into when trading in the stock market.
  • You will learn how to train yourself to overcome those traps and fundamentally become a better trader.
  • You know how to plan for a successful trade every time.
  • The market will never listen to you, but it will speak to you if you listen. learn what to recognize.
  • Quizes to test what you've learned.

Today, you can start to make good money in the market.


You don't even need a trading account to start learning - I show you how to become a better trader (literally!) showing exactly how you, like me, can use this course for immediate success.

You'll learn

  1. The traps we fall into.
  2. Why you enter and unfortunately stay in bad trades.
  3. How to break the cycle of trading poorly.
  4. How to coexist with the market.
  5. how to listen when the market speaks to you.
  6. Understand the difference between natural and trained success in the market.
  7. remove words and thoughts from our mind that are holding you back from success.
  8. How left brain / right brain thanking effects the way we trade and how to control it.
  9. how to train yourself for wild success in the markets.
  10. Recognize if there are self limiting beliefs holding you back from the finical freedom you deserve.
  11. How to get a plan together for successful trading.
  12. Understand what makes a good trade.
  13. Helpful links to understanding market patterns.

There is NEVER anything to pay! You can start with a virtual trading account.

So, you've read this far! Thank you.

Click the "take this course" button, top right, now ... every hour you delay is costing you money ...

Full details

What are the requirements?
  • basic trading knowledge required, it will be easier for beginners as you won't have to break bad trading habits
  • If you want to set up a virtual trading account it's recommend
What am I going to get from this course?
  • 17 lectures and 1 hour of video content and quizes!
  • Fundamentally change the way you see the stock market
  • Break bad trading habits
  • Establish how to place good trades every time
  • Lean how to make a trading plan before you ever place the trade
  • Learning market patterns - via helpful web links
  • Never "lose" another dollar in the stock market again
What is the target audience?
  • Anyone who wants to easily make money in the stock market
  • Anyone from any country
  • Anyone of any age or ability
title: Stock Markets: How I Became Rich By Changing How I Trade
